item.title: [delta] pkpoints glitch
item.dc:creator: @donlothario donlothario
item.description:
@donlothario wrote:

if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) {
client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
killerz.rating += 15;
killerz.sM(“You have defeated “+playerName+” and received 5 PK point.”);
killerz.pkPoints += 5;

i guess this means pkpoints is given when someone dies everywhere but fightcave pitgame and pitroom

The above code is looking for the killer as a player id. Since im not fighting a player, the ID is either returned null, or returned as your own. Either way it should believe i killed mYSELF…

i think i have to find the method checking if i am attacking on NPCs. Simply append the statement to not include that,

Read full topic
